sentences.en: " Come on,'said Drouet. " Brace up.
sentences.cn: “ 来", 杜洛埃说, " 鼓起勇起来.

sentences.en: A brace of tame deer ran familiarly about the house.
sentences.cn: 一对驯鹿无拘无束地在室内跑来跑去.

sentences.en: Brace yourself for the shock!
sentences.cn: 振作起来面对坏消息!

sentences.en: He braced himself for the icy plunge into the black water.
sentences.cn: 他准备跳入冰冷的黑水。

sentences.en: He came home with two brace of rabbits in the bag.
sentences.cn: 他带着装有两对野兔的猎袋回家来了.

sentences.en: He come home with two brace of rabbit in the bag.
sentences.cn: 他带著装有两对野兔的猎袋回家来了.

sentences.en: He tried to shake them off, to forget and brace up.
sentences.cn: 他想甩开它们, 忘记它们,振作起来.

sentences.en: He wore leg braces after he had polio in childhood.
sentences.cn: 小时候患小儿麻痹症后，他使用了腿部支架。

sentences.en: Here we have an internal brace which prevents the tissues from stretching but still allows you to mobilise the joint with some confidence.
sentences.cn: 说到这，我们会有一个内部支撑架防止组织被拉长，但是它仍然允许你自信地活动你的关节。

sentences.en: His jacket, I know, concealed a body brace which supported his spine.
sentences.cn: 我知道在他的外衣里面隐藏着一付支撑着他脊椎骨的支架.

sentences.en: Interest rates were raised to brace up the sagging dollar.
sentences.cn: 利率提高了,借以支撑疲软的美元.

sentences.en: Overhead, the lights showed the old timbers, used to brace the roof.
sentences.cn: 灯光照亮了头顶上支撑屋顶的旧房梁。

sentences.en: Sally now resolved to brace up and risk a frontal attack.
sentences.cn: 于是萨利决定鼓足勇气,冒险正面进攻.

sentences.en: She had to wear a brace after the accident.
sentences.cn: 出事以后她只得使用支架。

sentences.en: She wears a neck brace.
sentences.cn: 她戴着颈托。

sentences.en: The doctor cautioned him to brace up.
sentences.cn: 医生告诫他要振奋精神.

sentences.en: The gentle curve of the plywood louver creates its own structural brace and rigidity while softening the daylight around its profile.
sentences.cn: 百叶窗的柔和曲线的胶合板创建其自身的结构支撑和刚度，同时围绕日光其轮廓。

sentences.en: The mountain air will brace you.
sentences.cn: 山中空气将使你振作精神.

sentences.en: The odor of souls is a brace to the walls.
sentences.cn: 灵魂的气息是这些砖墙的支柱.

sentences.en: Wait until we’ve braced the ladder.
sentences.cn: 等我们把梯子支撑住再说。

sentences.en: Workers used steel beams to brace the roof.
sentences.cn: 工人用钢梁支撑屋顶。

sentences.en: You had better brace yourself for some bad news.
sentences.cn: 有些坏消息,你最好做好准备.

words.tran_cn: 支撑；使绷紧；做好准备；激励（brace的过去分词）
绷紧，顶住（brace的现在分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 一对，支架，牙箍，背带，大括号
trans.tran_en: something that is used to strengthen or support something, or to make it stiff

trans.tran_cn: 使做好准备，（为保持平衡）使紧靠，绷紧，支撑，加固
trans.tran_en: to make something stronger by supporting it
to mentally or physically prepare yourself or someone else for something unpleasant that is going to happen

trans.tran_cn: 使防备，使受锻炼；支住，撑牢，使绷紧
trans.tran_en: to make something stronger by supporting it
